metadata.title: Boy's Tailored Fit Check Tweed Retro Suit Set
features: Sophisticated check suit with a tweed fabric. This set brought by SIRRI comes as a three or size piece
The three-piece set features jacket, single-breasted Vest, and Pants. The six-piece set comes with a jacket, shirt, Vest, Pants, tie, and matching hanky

The retro-styled suit in Grigio antracite scuro comes with a green check tweed tie with matching hanky. The charcoal grey six-piece set comes with a red paisley tie with matching hanky The six-piece set in navy blue comes with a blue paisley tie with matching hanky

Made from premium poly/viscose & is a thicker style fabric that makes it suitable for all seasons. Wear this suit as a pageboy sleek outfit, weddings, birthdays, parties, or any formal event. Premium thick material for warmth and comfort. Cool wash, do not Dry Clean, Cool Iron

Kindly refer to the size chart under the product's images, at the left of the screen, before placing your order. Images of the actual item shot under neutral lighting conditions and may seem slightly different on different screens.
description: This boy's tailored fit check tweed retro suit set is sure to make a statement at any formal event! With its dapper vintage style, this suit is perfect for weddings, galas, and other formal affairs. Tailored to fit boys perfectly, made with luxurious check tweed fabric, this set will keep your little one looking sharp all night long!
Cool wash, do not Dry Clean, Cool Iron
Grigio antracite scuro, charcoal grey and navy blue
Notch lapelDouble front closureHandkerchief pocketFlip-up pockets Coin pocketTwo inside pocketsThree-button cuffSingle vent on the back
Elasticated waistZip closure with fasteningSingle front pleatSingle back pocket with button closureNo turn-up
